Or fastest pickup Tomorrow 7 AM - 11 AM. Order within 8 hrs 36 mins
features: 🏆Colorful RGB lighting: The KO-STAR gaming computer microphone is equipped with RGB breathing LED lights, which can automatically change into multiple colors to create an ideal carnival atmosphere and make your gaming or live streaming effects more eye-catching. It can also visually display the working status of the microphone. Light on: working, light off: mute

🏆EXCELLENT SOUND QUALITY: The cardioid pickup gaming microphone is designed with a 14mm premium sound chipset and 192kHz/24-bit high sampling rate, and features noise reduction to capture clear, smooth, vivid sound and suppress unwanted background noise. High-quality sound makes USB computer microphones the choice for presentations, podcasting, Skype, recording, streaming, or gaming

🏆QUICK Mute Button: The condenser gaming microphone has a mute touch button on the top for easy touch. Even if you are focused on gaming and need to cough or sneeze, you can instantly mute your computer microphone with one click without having to hold down the computer microphone button. Let you know at a glance when the mute RGB light of your computer microphone is turned off and when the non-muted RGB light is on.
🏆Compact size: This mini gaming microphone is compact in size and takes up only a small space to use, saving more desktop space. This live broadcast microphone will bring you a different experience

🏆Noise reduction accessories: Computer gaming microphone comes with pop filter and shock mount. These accessories can help you filter out noise from your breath, air, or desktop vibrations. Let your teammates or viewers hear clearer, smoother sound

🏆Plug and Play Setup: You just need to plug in the USB cable to use this computer microphone. No additional drivers are required. This streaming microphone is compatible with computers, PCs, laptops, desktops, Mac OS, Windows, PS4, PS5 or all Type-C phones, tablets (requires USB C to USB adapter - included in the package). Not compatible with Xbox. Alternatively, you can mount the microphone on a standard boom arm using a 5/8" male to 3/8" female adapter (not included)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars KO Star microphone review
reviews.reviewText: I had been using the internal microphone and speakers on my laptop for my Pimslueur French training. The internal microphone often garbled my voice to the point that the Pimslueur app could not understand what I was saying. It also, sometimes would not pick up my initial words. (You can play back your recording for self evaluation). It was so bad that I stopped using the voice coach function because the recordings were so unreliable. With the Ko-Star mic, everything is picked up and is recorded crystal clear. Frustration gone learning continues. 😎

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works good. Just make sure the usb is in all the way!
reviews.reviewText: If using the usb connector to usbc. Just have it all the way. Otherwise it won't work.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good little starter mic
reviews.reviewText: I bought this mic to use for Twitch streaming, which I'm a total beginner at so I wasn't looking for anything fancy, and I'm impressed! I don't know much about mics anyway, so this was so easy to plug in and start using without issue. It hooked up with OBS no problem. The sound quality is good enough for my needs, and my friends who tuned into my stream said that everything sounded crystal clear. I also recorded a couple clips just to see for myself, and it didn't seem to pick up any background noise or have any static/weird noises or anything.The RGB lighting is cool too, though I cannot for the life of me figure out how to change the settings. I'm not sure if that's located in computer settings or something, but there wasn't any software that popped up when I plugged it in, and there doesn't appear to be a button to change it on the mic itself.I was also very glad to find a mic that came in pink, however I will say that the color isn't quite true to the listing. The pictures made it look like a light baby pink, but the product is more of a peachy pink, almost like a salmon color (see photo). It's not the end of the world, but I know some people are very particular about their setup colors so just be mindful of that. This is why I knocked off a star in my rating.Overall, it's good for the price and definitely good for a beginner at streaming. I'm not sure how well it would do for something like podcasting or music recording or anything though. The only thing is I'm not sure how much I actually like streaming in general lol so there's a chance that I'll end up returning this anyway, but that's not a reflection of the product quality at all! Would recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great PC mic!!!
reviews.reviewText: The KO-STAR USB Microphone has truly elevated my gaming experience on my PC, delivering exceptional audio quality and clarity that deserves a solid five-star rating! The condenser mic captures my voice with precision, making in-game communication and live streaming an absolute delight. Its seamless compatibility with various platforms, including PS4, PS5, and Mac, makes it a versatile and reliable choice for any gamer looking to enhance their audio setup.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This is a really good MIc, no complaints here love the compact design

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Decent Mini Microphone
reviews.reviewText: I originally ordered this mic thinking that it is actually bigger than it is. I was thinking that it is more similar to a full size desktop mic; but it is actually kind of a small mic. About half the size of a normal condenser microphone. However it still produces decent well balanced recording of my voice. I only use it for VOIP calls and occasionally as a secondary Mic when I play online games. Although I have a normal Lapel mic for that which doesn't sound as good as this mic.The cable that came with the mic is actually a decent length which let me plug this into my HUB which is a bit far away from where I actually use the mic.Overall I am pretty happy with it, even if it is smaller than I expected.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Pretty good USB microphone
reviews.reviewText: This is a pretty good USB microphone. The microphone has a USB-C port for power and data, and comes with USB-C to USB-A cable, as well as a USB-A to USB-C adapter, so it’s ready to connect to any common USB port.The sound quality is pretty good. Unsurprisingly, it doesn’t pick up voices as well as more expensive conference microphones, and the resulting audio quality isn’t as good either. Even so, it works for basic voice recording/streaming and is easy to control.Overall, I can recommend this microphone for casual use, but it isn’t a replacement for a professional microphone.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars The microphone is faulty with static
reviews.reviewText: The microphone doesn't work properly - a static sound whenever you speak.
